md4mg: metadata for metagenomics

Vince Carey1

Source: vignettes/md4mg.Rmd
md4mg.Rmd

Introduction

library(tibble)
metadata=as_tibble(jsonlite::fromJSON(txt=url('https://api.omicidx.cancerdatasci.org/sra/studies/SRP114847/runs?size=500'),flatten=TRUE)$hits)

#The sample variables can be grabbed like so:
metadata %>% dplyr::select(accession, sample.attributes) %>% tidyr::unnest(sample.attributes) %>% tidyr::pivot_wider(names_from='tag', values_from='value')
#> # A tibble: 219 x 12
#>    accession collection_date env_biome env_feature env_material geo_loc_name
#>    <chr>     <chr>           <chr>     <chr>       <chr>        <chr>
